title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Practical Competency Enhancement Course Based on Pharmacotherapy Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the rationale for medication selection and dosage adjustments with 80% accuracy through virtual patient cases
Learners can document treatment efficacy evaluation and adverse effect monitoring procedures following the SOAP note format
Learners rate the realism of decision-making processes in high-fidelity clinical simulations at 4 points or higher (5-point scale)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
